mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sampleAppoint (appointId, clientId, companyName, productName, code, contactName, telephone, state, appointTime, comment) VALUES (#{appointId}, #{clientId}, #{companyName}, #{productName}, #{code}, #{contactName}, #{telephone}, #{state}, #{appointTime}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sampleAppoint WHERE appointId LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR companyName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR contactName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR telephone LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR productName LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR state=#{keyword}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sampleAppoint WHERE appointId LIKE "%"#{appointId}"%"
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sampleAppoint SET productName=#{productName}, code=#{code} WHERE appointId=#{appointId}

UPDATE t_sampleappoint SET companyName=#{companyName}, contactName=#{contactName}, telephone=#{telephone}, clientId=#{clientId}, appointTime=#{appointTime}, comment=#{comment} WHERE appointId=#{appointId};
UPDATE t_sampleAppoint SET state='Appointed' WHERE appointId=#{appointId}
UPDATE t_sampleAppoint SET state='SampleTaked' WHERE appointId=#{appointId}
UPDATE t_sampleAppoint SET state='Canceld' WHERE appointId=#{appointId}
